Name: [hamza]{.trn}
Description: The sound of of the breath stopping between the words "oh oh" and "a apple".

Name: ['alif]{.trn}
Description: A vowel like in English "man". But after these letters ([خ،ر،ص،ض،غ،ق]{.ar}) it sounds like "awe" in English "awesome".

Name: [bA]{.trn}
Description: Like English b in boy

Name: [tA]{.trn}
Description: Like English t in tall but softer

Name: [vA]{.trn}
Description: Like English th in think but softer

Name: [jIm]{.trn}
Description: Like English j in just

Name: [HA]{.trn}
Description: Like English h in hat but the sound comes from the bottom of the throat

Name: [xA]{.trn}
Description: Not found in English. Try saying kh but from the top of the throat

Name: [dAl]{.trn}
Description: Like English th in this.

Name: [pAl]{.trn}
Description: Between this and zoo with the tip of tongue lightly touching the front teeth and keeping the mouth flat.

Name: [rA]{.trn}
Description: Like English r in rat

Name: [zA]{.trn}
Description: Like English z in zoo

Name: [sIn]{.trn}
Description: Like English s in see

Name: [cIn]{.trn}
Description: Like English sh in show

Name: [SAd]{.trn}
Description: An emphatic س not found in English

Name: [DAd]{.trn}
Description: An emphatic د not found in English

Name: [TA]{.trn}
Description: An emphatic ت not found in English

Name: [ZA]{.trn}
Description: An emphatic ز not found in English

Name: [eayn]{.trn}
Description: A very peculiar sound formed in the throat

Name: [gayn]{.trn}
Description: Like between English g and a soft r.

Name: [fA ]{.trn}
Description: kjd

Name: [qAf]{.trn}
Description: kjd

Name: [kAf]{.trn}
Description: kjd

Name: [lAm]{.trn}
Description: kjd

Name: [mIm]{.trn}
Description: kjd

Name: [nUn]{.trn}
Description: kjd

Name: [hA]{.trn}
Description: kjd

Name: [wAw ]{.trn}
Description: A letter like w in English well Or a vowel like oo in English moon

Name: [yA ]{.trn}
Description: A letter like y in English yellow Or a vowel like ee in English been.
